## R

### General

-	[R for Reproducible Scientific Analysis](https://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/) by Software Carpentry
-	[R for Data Science (2e)](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/) by Hadley Wickham et al.

### Beginner
-	[Learn R](https://www.codecademy.com/learn/learn-r) by Codecademy
-	[Hands-On Programming with R](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/index.html) by Garrett Grolemund

### Intermediate/Advanced
-	[NCEAS Learning Hub’s coreR Course](https://learning.nceas.ucsb.edu/2023-04-coreR/)
-	[Advanced R](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/) by Hadley Wickham
-	[Efficient R programming](https://csgillespie.github.io/efficientR/index.html) by Colin Gillespie

### Visualization
-	[Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction](https://socviz.co/) by Kieran Healy
- [ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis (3e)](https://ggplot2-book.org/) by Hadley Wickham et al.

### GIS
-	[Geocomputation with R](https://r.geocompx.org/) by Robin Lovelace et al. 
-	[Geographic Data Science with R: Visualizing and Analyzing Environmental Change](https://bookdown.org/mcwimberly/gdswr-book/) by Michael Wimberly 
-	[Spatial Data Science](https://r-spatial.org/book/) by Edzer Pebesma and Roger Bivand
- [RFF GIS Learning Lab](https://my.rff.org/it/computer-lab/)
